name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert A. CARL, Jr., Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1015
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert A. CARL, Jr., Appellant.
